ing.item: Apple; peeled and thinly sliced, (1 1/2 cups)

directions.step:
Prep Time: 17 min. Bake Time: 50 mins.
Heat oven to 350. Grease spring-form pan, 9x2 inches, or round pan, 9x1 1/2 inches.
Beat 1/2 cup sugar, the margarine and egg in medium bowl on low speed 30 seconds or until smooth. Beat in baking mix. Spread over bottom and 1 inch up side of pan. Mix yogurt and egg until smooth. Stir in apple. Spoon over batter in pan. Mix 1/4 cup sugar and the cinnamon: sprinkle over apple mixture.
Bake 45 to 50 minutes or until center is set and crust is deep golden brown. Cool 10 minutes; remove side of pan. Serve warm.
8 servings. Posted to brand-name-recipes by Whimsey Stephens <whimsey@mindspring.com> on Feb 03, 1998
